original_text: So I went along the path in the valley while it was still night. I continued to look at the wall. I reached the Valley Gate again and I went back into the city.
korean_text: 그 밤에 시내를 따라 올라가서 성벽을 살펴본 후에 돌아서 골짜기 문으로 들어와 돌아왔으나

sentences.original_text: So I went along the path in the valley
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 골짜기의 길을 따라 걸어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: I continued to look at the wall
I reached the Valley Gate again
and I went back into the city
